categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Wave VI

nodes.text: The Most Wanted Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features detailed miniatures of a BTL Y-wing starfighter and two Z-95 Headhunters. It was released on February 26, 2015 as part of the game's sixth wave of expansions.

Get your Scum and Villainy faction quickly up to speed with the Most Wanted Expansion Pack for X-Wing™! Featuring three starship miniatures with alternative, Scum-themed paint schemes and a whole fleet's worth of ship cards, upgrades, tokens, and maneuver dials, the Most Wanted Expansion Pack serves as the core of your Scum and Villainy faction, establishing its flavor and allowing you to quickly assemble a fleet by repurposing your existing X-Wing starships for use within the faction.
The Most Wanted Expansion Pack contains three miniatures, plus a maneuver dial and action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
